Plot: Two Western bank/train robbers flee to Bolivia when the law gets too close.
Title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
Actors: Paul Newman, Robert Redford, Katharine Ross, Strother Martin
tomatoConsensus: With its iconic pairing of Paul Newman and Robert Redford, jaunty screenplay and Burt Bacharach score, Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid has gone down as among the defining moments in late-'60s American cinema.
